column4: hey, I just tried to boot into kubuntu from a live cd (I bought the original CD) on my XPS 17, but it failed, it loaded for a while, then it just hang up and nothing else happened. I tried with normal ubuntu from usb too, it hangs up too, with SCPI error (or something like that)
does anybody use ubuntu/kubuntu on the XPS 17?
did you have any problems while booting the livecd/installer?
